title: #136: Everyone Is A Domestic Terrorist Now
description:
If people thought that having a nosey neighbor that called the cops whenever the music got a little loud or the party went on a little late was annoying, they are really going to hate having that same neighbor enabled by the police to spy on their activities and report back to Gestapo Headquarters.

These days, everyone is considered to be a Nazi, except those that are actually doing Nazi things like ratting out their neighbors for having too many cars in the driveway on Thanksgiving during COVID. What is also becoming a new trend, is that the term “domestic terrorist” is getting quite a bit of use by people that cannot seem to mentally handle anyone having a differing opinion.

Those that do not understand history are doomed to repeat it, and the people calling for others to be put on lists will, in the end, be put on lists themselves.
